title: Richer multi-stop colorful global background gradient

requirements.summary: Replace the subtle global background gradient on the loading screen and main app shell with a richer multi-stop gradient using theme colors, while preserving readable contrast in light and dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: On both the loading screen and the main app shell, the background appears noticeably more colorful than the current gradient.
Text and UI elements remain clearly legible (no low-contrast sections) in both light mode (:root) and dark mode (.dark).
The change is implemented without editing any files listed under frontend immutablePaths.

file_operations.description: Add new reusable global utility class(es) for a richer, multi-stop background gradient that blends theme tokens (background + translucent primary/secondary/accent) with separate tuned definitions for :root and .dark to maintain foreground contrast.

Wire the new global background utility class into both the loading screen wrapper and the main app shell wrapper, replacing the existing subtle bg-gradient-to-br usage so both states share the updated colorful gradient.
